author: alon.ssv.network
content:
Yeah we have, we will be making that available soon. 
You must have all the data to actually have slashing protection on the wallet level... otherwise the keys are very susceptible for a signing request that can cause slashing.  

Most don't realize that slashing penalties are dynamic, meaning that more people get slashed the bigger the penalty is. 
Using a service that holds your validation keys (or has unfiltered access to them) is very dangerous, the bigger the service the bigger the penalties on individual users.
